thread.title: Re: Teener killed, 3 others hurt in Masbate shooting incident
thread.title_full: Re: Teener killed, 3 others hurt in Masbate shooting incident

author: ang_dagat
title: Re: Teener killed, 3 others hurt in Masbate shooting incident
text:
Inquirer Southern Luzon / 10:02 AM February 19, 2017 
LEGAZPI CITYâ€”A teenage boy was killed while three others where wounded in a shooting incident in Cataingan town in Masbate on Saturday night, police said Sunday. 
Police Senior Inspector Maria Luisa Calubaquib, Bicol police spokesperson, said around 8:20 p.m. while the Tubos family was sleeping inside their house in Sitio Puro, Barangay (village) Villa Pogado, an unidentified person wearing a bonnet forcibly entered then began shooting. 
Elvie, 32, Angelica, 9, and Titing, all surnamed Tubos, sustained several gushot wounds in different parts of the body while Ariel, 14, died on the spot with a fatal injury on the chest. ADVERTISEMENT 
The wounded were brought to Cataingan District Hospital for medical attention. The suspect fled after the incident. RAM
